name: The frontend development team has finished adding the ability for customers to include a Call Recording Free Trial in their purchase.
title: The frontend development team has finished adding the ability for customers to include a Call Recording Free Trial in their purchase.
description:
Given: I Am on avoxi website phone number selection page .
And: select a phone number ,forward calls to
When: select choose your plan
Then: select your add on features
And: complete your correct information and click continue
And: Review and place orders
And: enter a valid test credit card Payment method
And: I accept the terms and conditions of this new service
And: Place the order
